VEC.Q: How many ridgelines are in this ridgeline chart?
VEC.A: There are {5} slices in this chart.

SRP.Q: What is the spatial relationship of the peak of Work-Life Balance relative to the peak of Compensation in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: The peak of  Work-Life Balance is to the {right} of the peak of Compensation.

VPR.Q: What distribution pattern does the ridgeline representing Career Growth show?
VPR.A: The ridgeline representing Career Growth shows a {Single Peak Distribution}.

VPR.Q: At what value do  Job Security reach its peaks?

EVJ.Q: Which ridgeline has the highest peak
EVJ.A: The ridgeline representing {Career Growth} has the highest peak.

EVJ.Q: Which label has the highest density at X =31.1?
EVJ.A: At X =31.1,the label with the highest density is {Remote Work Options}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks exceed 25? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Remote Work Options}'s peak at {30},{Job Security}'s peak at {46}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks below 64? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Career Growth}'s peak at {9},{Work-Life Balance}'s peak at {10},{Remote Work Options}'s peak at {30},{Compensation}'s peak at {9},{Job Security}'s peak at {46}

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Compensation or Career Growth?
NC.A: {Compensation} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Work-Life Balance or Compensation?
NC.A: {Work-Life Balance} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Remote Work Options or Compensation?
NC.A: {Remote Work Options} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

MSR.Q: How many ridges have their peak located to the right of the average X value across all ridges?
MSR.A: There are {0} ridges whose peaks are located to the right of the average X value.

MSR.Q: What is the label of the ridge with the largest span along the mountain height?
MSR.A: The ridge with the largest span in the mountain height is {Career Growth}
